name: composer/ca-bundle
description: Lets you find a path to the system CA bundle, and includes a fallback to the Mozilla CA bundle.

name: doctrine/inflector
description: Common String Manipulations with regard to casing and singular/plural rules.

name: fig/link-util
description: Common utility implementations for HTTP links

name: google/recaptcha
description: Client library for reCAPTCHA, a free service that protect websites from spam and abuse.

suggest.joomla/session: To use AbstractWebApplication with session support, install joomla/session

suggest.ext-zlib: To extract gzip or zip compressed packages

suggest.joomla/database: Required if you want to use Joomla\Authentication\Strategies\DatabaseStrategy
suggest.joomla/input: Required if you want to use classes in the Joomla\Authentication\Strategies namespace

suggest.joomla/application: The joomla/application package is required to use Joomla\Controller\AbstractController
suggest.joomla/input: The joomla/input package is required to use Joomla\Controller\AbstractController

suggest.ext-mysqli: To connect to a MySQL database via MySQLi
suggest.ext-pdo: To connect to a MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, or SQLite database via PDO
suggest.ext-pgsql: To connect to a PostgreSQL database
suggest.ext-sqlsrv: To connect to a SQL Server database
suggest.joomla/di: To use the Database ServiceProviderInterface objects, install joomla/di.
suggest.joomla/registry: To use the Database ServiceProviderInterface objects, install joomla/registry.

suggest.joomla/language: Required only if you want to use `OutputFilter::stringURLSafe`.

suggest.ext-curl: To use cURL for HTTP connections

suggest.symfony/yaml: Install symfony/yaml if you require YAML support.

suggest.ext-apcu: To use APCu cache as a session handler
suggest.ext-memcached: To use a Memcached server as a session handler
suggest.ext-redis: To use a Redis server as a session handler
suggest.ext-wincache: To use WinCache as a session handler
suggest.joomla/database: Install joomla/database if you want to use Database session storage.
suggest.joomla/event: The joomla/event package is required to use Joomla\Session\Session.
suggest.joomla/input: The joomla/input package is required to use Address and Forwarded session validators.

name: mso/idna-convert
description: A library for encoding and decoding internationalized domain names

name: paragonie/random_compat

suggest.ext-libsodium: Provides a modern crypto API that can be used to generate random bytes.

description: PHP 5.x polyfill for random_bytes() and random_int() from PHP 7

name: paragonie/sodium_compat

suggest.ext-libsodium: PHP < 7.0: Better performance, password hashing (Argon2i), secure memory management (memzero), and better security.
suggest.ext-sodium: PHP >= 7.0: Better performance, password hashing (Argon2i), secure memory management (memzero), and better security.

description: Pure PHP implementation of libsodium; uses the PHP extension if it exists

name: phpmailer/phpmailer

suggest.ext-mbstring: Needed to send email in multibyte encoding charset
suggest.symfony/polyfill-mbstring: To support UTF-8 if the Mbstring PHP extension is not enabled (^1.2)

description: PHPMailer is a full-featured email creation and transfer class for PHP

name: symfony/polyfill-mbstring
description: Symfony polyfill for the Mbstring extension

suggest.symfony/console: For validating YAML files using the lint command
